Question
========
What does the speed of a mechanical wave depend on? **Select all that apply.**

Answerlist
----------
* properties of the medium
* frequency
* wavelength
* amplitude
* energy of the wave


Solution
========
The speed of a mechanical wave depends only on the properties of the medium 
(temperature, density, tension, viscosity, stiffness, etc.)
